title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, published on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use any Ollama model as an LLM or embedding provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’), installable via Docker or pip.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android compatibility, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API with ActiveRecord-style syntax.

title: ollamajs (npm wrapper)
summary: Lightweight community npm package providing typed Ollama bindings for Node.js.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI tool for chatting, listing, and pulling Ollama models written in Go.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that routes suggestions through a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that chats using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds a /ollama slash command for private LLM chats.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose templates for CPU & GPU deployments of Ollama and WebUI.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library for Ollama with support for streaming, chat, and embeddings.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app that connects to local Ollama instances for quick prototyping.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex for document Q&A.

title: reddit/r/ollama
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, and showcasing Ollama projects.
